kariminf.ktoolja.math

Class Calculus

  • java.lang.Object
    • kariminf.ktoolja.math.Calculus

  • public class Calculus
extends java.lang.Object
    This class contains static methods used for calculus, such as combination and median.

      • factorial

        public static int factorial(int num)
        Calculates the factorial of a natural number. If the number is less than 0, it returns 0.
        Parameters:
        num - a natural number
        Returns:
        the factorial of this number; if the number is less than0, 0 is returned

        Parameters:

        size - size of combination
        Returns:
        number of possible combinations

      • getCombinations

        public static java.util.List<java.util.List<java.lang.Integer>> getCombinations(int size,
                                                                                int nbr)
        Returns a list of list of possible combinations.

        It takes the size of our set and the max number of combinations, then it gives as all possible combinations from 1 to the max number. For a size n, the elements are 0,1,...,n-1.

        For example:
        getCombinations(4,2) = {{0}, {1}, {2}, {3}, {0,1}, {0,2}, {0,3}, {1,2}, {1,3}, {2,3}}

        Parameters:
        size - The number of elements in our set
        nbr - The number of maximum combinations, for example 2 elements, etc.
        Returns:
        a list containing lists of combinations

      • addToComb

        private static java.util.List<java.util.List<java.lang.Integer>> addToComb(int size,
                                                                           int start,
                                                                           int nbr)
        Recursive method used to search different combinations of a set of elements starting from an element with a maximum number of combinations.
        Parameters:
        size - the size of the elements set
        start - starting point
        nbr - maximum number of combinations
        Returns:
        a list containing lists of combinations
